name: Bleb
description:
You play as a small Bleb who needs to collect 4 shards and bring them to the altar to summon and defeat the ancient evil 

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

LMB - Fire/Build

Tab - BuildMode

MouseWheel - Change building

Q - Heal

E - Hard hit(close)

And that's all! Game still have so much problems, but i hope you'll like it.
